attributes.review: I wanted to download the app to see what all the trouble was and when I opened it I was blasted in the eyes with a powerful red laser 🧚‍♀️✨✨ that made them fall out and roll across the floor and my dog came over and he licked them up don’t ever download this app🦑🍔
attributes.title: My eyes fell out 😵😦

attributes.review: This is the worst app EVER!!! DO NOT download!!!!! If you do you are promoting racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and more horrific things. This man talks about “freedom” and “equal rights” but you need to open your eyes and see what has really happened and happening. So I beg of you, PLEASE do not support this disgusting man.
attributes.title: Do NOT Download!!!

attributes.review: It took forever to download, and when it did, it gave my device a virus, that deleted all my personal files. This virus caused bugs to come, which took over my room. These cockroaches then stole all of my water bottles!!!!!!!😡😡🤬
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: I opened the app and the first thing that showed up was this orange guy and he was so scary... personally I would scared to see him pop up on the app any time I open it so I recommend just taking down the app cause he a big scary man 😾
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review:

attributes.title: No

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this application it took me to this strange orange with a face on it and then some random people showed up at my house and started beating me so I got my gun and went pew pew and now I am in the hospital from seeing such ugly faces all day.
attributes.title: This app was horrible app 🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.review: The app wouldn't even download, I had to retry over and over again. They also brought men dressed in all black with masks on to my house!!!! I feel attacked. 😡 They left shortly after I have them ramen. But they shouldnt have cane anyways!!! I give the app 0. OUT OF TEN!!!
attributes.title: Worst App Ever!!

attributes.review: it took 3 weeks to properly download and once it did it hacked into my account and leaked my baby pictures😭 after that the app got ahold of my phone number and spammed me with BIBLE QUOTES. 0/5 would not recommend. also i was greeted by and ugly man whom i don’t know so very disturbed.
attributes.title: WORST. APP. EVER.

attributes.review: I would give this app no stars if I could! So I downloaded the app and was super excited because people seemed to love it 🧚‍♀️! They were WRONG!! 😡😡😡 I saw a orange. And I am super allergic to oranges so I had a seizure!!!!! 🤬🤬Then a army of ninjas were sent to my house and STABBED ME!! I am ok now tho. Pls pray for me 😢🙏🏻
